attributes.review: this app gives me chills due to the fact that he used Cambridge analytical imagine what he is using now through technological advancements who knows what kind of evil things the Republican Party is doing through this app tracking our location accessing our cameras taking pictures of our American faces. I hope to the Lord that this app is thoroughly inspected more throughly than his campaign, tax’s, and impeachment that this app will be removed from this American App Store
attributes.title: Data Concerns

attributes.review: I was downloading the app to support my president and to keep America great! Turns out the app exposes your location to Ku Klux Klan members, and me being African American freaked out and tried to delete it. Next thing I got a note saying “You better vote for him N*****” under my doorstep I then saw a pickup truck sit outside my house for days before I had to call the police, turns out they were planning to ambush me and lynch my body in the forest. I will never support Trump EVER again.
attributes.title: Almost lost my life....

attributes.review: This app has ruined my phone, it’s constantly glitching and trumps face is just flashing across my screen at all times. As soon as I downloaded the app and made my profile, my bird fell over off his perch and died. It’s a bad omen and I should’ve never risked it knowing the curses that follow that office, horrible app. It also has tons of false information on it and blatant lies written into his articles. 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: My phone will never recover from this

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting it to have fun games. there were ZERO games. instead, when i opened the app it immediately asked me if i wanted to join a white supremacy group. like no thank you. then trump came to my house and beat up my grandma and stole my goldfish. i loved that goldfish. horrible app. don’t download it. like many people are saying in the reviews, it is 100% cursed. the minute i downloaded it, my house caught on fire. coincidence? i think not.
attributes.title: horrible and cursed

attributes.review: I’ve been supporting trump for a long time but his app is just terrible, as I tried to open the app my phone screen cracked, so I went on an got it fixed for $150. So now that I could finally use my phone I tried once again to open the app and my sister started crying and yelling, I don’t recommend getting this app, if you support trump like I do just keep doing what you are doing but this app is just not it god bless😊🙄
attributes.title: Total garbage Trump 2020 Though!!!!🙈

attributes.review: I thought America was supposed to be one of the best countries in the world. But I guess I was wrong. This stupid puffy Cheeto man has completely ruined our country. I feel ashamed that I downloaded this app, even if it was just leave a bad review. I hope for the worst for the trump 2020 campaign and I hope trump realizes what he has done to OUR country. I thought the whole point of America was that all of the citizens actually got a say in what happens in OUR country. Guess not. BLM✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: 🖕Trump

attributes.review: I am not satisfied with this app. It ask for my number and when I put it in it just spams my phone. I don’t understand how people can give this app a good review. They either don’t spend much time on their phones or are psychos if they let there phone spam that much. I just keep up with news and hear what this flaming hot Cheeto of a president has to say.  Anyways I don’t know why I wasted my time downloading this app, but you know you got to do it for the gen z. LONG LIVE GEN Z😗✌🏼
attributes.title: Uhhh... NO😗

attributes.review: This was the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. After opening the app a virus came about my entire device. I was unable to use my phone for days. I tried to get it fixed but no one could help me. I had to buy an entirely new phone. Absolutely ridiculous. This app was not worth that kind of money. This guy has no idea what’s even going on with his own app let alone America let alone the entire world. He’s clueless and idiotic. Trump 2020, but on a ✨🧚‍♂️tombstone🧚‍♂️✨.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The first thing that comes up when I log in is it asking for my credit card. I just wanted to support our lovely Christian president of the GREAT USA 🇺🇸 but it wouldn’t let me see anything or do anything without my credit card info. And I got a bunch of spam callers speaking RUSSIAN AND CHINESE!!!!!! must be a FAKE APP made by HILARY AND OBAMA to discredit our GREAT LEADER!!!!! all I wanted to do was know the rally information so that I could SUPPORT OUR LEADER by not wearing a mask and showing the DEMS THAT THIS IS A FAKE VIRUS MADE UP TO CREATE VOTER FRAUD!!!!
attributes.title: Why is this asking for credit card?!?!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app looking to learn more about our amazing president and ways that I could support him BUT then I remembered that all apps matter and by downloading/using this app I was clearly showing favoritism. The only solutions I could think of were to download every single app(which I didn’t have space for on my phone) or to delete it, so I did the latter. I also remembered that I’m not an idiot and that the namesake of this app has a tiny dick ❤️
attributes.title: All apps matter
